Lunarpine followed her outside, "It's nice and warm up here." He was 
glad to finally have her alone, there were to many distractions 
inside.He transformed to wolf and stood beside her. "We've got a 
little time before class so you wanna take a walk?"

Razor Claw was paranoid about his new "friends" "They probably went 
outside to plot against me, I'll be ready.

(I'll private Email you the class notes so we don't have to sit for 
hours for a short class.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> Smiling. "Good, then I can learn from you both. Let's go outside. 
> There isn't room in here." She walked out of the room. The 
clipoeard 
> and pen floated beind her. She walked to the entrance and opened 
the 
> doors. She stepped out and inhaled the crisp, clean winter 
> air. "Ahhh, it's wonderful to be outside again." She took a few 
steps 
> away from the base.  She went and stoos about 10 yards out and 
waited.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine smiled at Ice's mental message. "Me too, You think you 
> can 
> > handle a sparring session with me?"
> > 
> > "You mean us don't you?" Razor Claw inturupted, "If theres a 
> > competition then I'm in." He seemed rather sure of himself and 
> fealt 
> > he had something to prove.
> > 
> > "OK, you're in." Lunarpine concluded that if he wanted an excuse 
to 
> > kick this newcomers tail he'd take any opportunity that came his 
> way.
> >
